name: Unlimited Tendies 2
description:
Github: https://github.com/JemWritesCode/GMTKJam2022

The Game

Level up your paper hands into diamond hands by rolling the dice and risking it all on the stock market. Make your way to the New York Stock Exchange and try to take it all home.

Objective  Smack the ATMs by running into them a few times to get some tendies! Then buy some better hands from Reddit. Earn your Diamond Hands.

Dodge the credit cards, they come with bills and will take your tendies.

Controls

WASD to move

Scroll mouse wheel to zoom camera

Hold Right Click to move Camera

Left Click to Wave and show off your hands

ESC to close the game (Quits Application)

Our GMTK Game Jam 2022 submission!  

This is JemWritesCode's 2nd game jam and Redseiko's first! The theme was Roll of the Dice. So we made a game about rolling the dice on investments.  

Credits

JemWritesCode - Programming / Level Design / Voice Acting

Redseiko - Programming 

JamieDawsonCode - Helped pick bg music and sounds

** Not affiliated with Wall Street Bets in any way. It's just a project we used to learn how to make a Unity game together for laughs.
